entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending after midnight then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
